name: TowerDefenseBasic
description:
Hello again!!! Game number 7

This one is a TowerDefense Game, in which you must defend your castle from strange warriors before they enter the door, by placing towers in the tiles, you may use the code inside as you please

This one has a lot of improvements that can be made, but im happy as the template is quite solid

see you around space Cowboys! dont forget to laugh at my efforts
